Template Function ccn_act_hande¶

  • Defined in File user_functions.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
void ccn_act_hande(float_t &p_prime, float_t &w_prime, float_t &T_prime, float_t &qv_prime, float_t &qc_prime, float_t &Nc, const double &EPSILON, std::vector<float_t> &res, model_constants_t<float_t> &cc)¶

CCN activation after Hande et al 2016. https://doi.org/10.5194/acp-16-12059-2016

@params p_prime Pressure [Pa] @params w_prime Ascend velocity [m s^-1] @params T_prime Temperature [K] @params qv_prime Water vapor mixing ratio @params qc_prime Cloud water mixing ratio @params Nc Number of cloud droplets @params EPSILON Small value that qc needs to exceed @params res Vector to store the changes @params cc Model constants
